description: It’s going to sound biased, but I don’t particularly care: I’ve been waiting to see Drew Sebastian paired with his real-life partner Dolf Dietrich on Lucas Entertainment since it was made known the scene was a go, and it turned out even hotter than I was expecting. As said on Drew’s model page, he’s one of my favorite muscle bears in porn today, and with the equally handsome Dolf Dietrich they have put on some of the best duo shows Lucas Cams has aired. In the tradition of the original “Bareback Lovers” movie, we see a sexual perspective in porn rarely seen -- the one between two genuine lovers. They’re both aggressively tender and passionate with one another, and it’s the perfect capstone scene to the upcoming film “Drew Sebastian’s Raw Seduction.” I don’t want to give away too many details as to what happens -- this is a scene you’ll have to see to truly appreciate!
title: Watch Drew Sebastian’s Raw Seduction Of Dolf Dietrich
